docs.title: LAMBDA
docs.text:
LAMBDA toolbox is an open-source implementation of the Least-squares AMBiguity Decorrelation Adjustment method

See Documentation: LAMBDA toolbox - Documentation

Cite: Massarweh, L., Verhagen, S. & Teunissen, P.J.G. New LAMBDA toolbox for mixed-integer models: estimation and evaluation. GPS Solut 29, 14 (2025). https://doi.org/10.1007/s10291-024-01738-z
